title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data from a table within a grid cell.
description: When attempting to export data from a table that is located within a grid cell, an exception is thrown. The error occurs in the 'ReportEngineService.getMetaData()' method.
OB: An exception is thrown when exporting data from a table within a grid cell.
EB: Data should be successfully exported from the tables within the grid cells.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Insert a table into one grid cell.  
2. Insert another table into a different grid cell.  
3. Attempt to export data from both tables.
